title.narrative: Thien Viet Securities Joint Stock Company Ltd.

description.narrative:
Founded in late 2006 and capitalized at USD25 million, TVS is one of the youngest players in the top 10 (of 103) securities brokers/investment banks in terms of chartered capital. The Company offers a full spectrum of investment banking and brokerage services with the primary focus on international quality merchant banking and investment banking services, complex M&A/corporate finance transactions targeting at middle-market private companies, as well as both foreign institutional clients on the buy side. In addition to financing, TVS also provides advice to its clients in areas of strategic development, operational management and corporate governance.
By investing in TVS, IFC will help the young firm to build up its capacity and achieve its objective in becoming a leading local merchant/investment bank of international standards.

Like other capital markets in their early stages of development, the practices in Vietnams securities industry fall short of international best practice industry standards. Unlike most other players, TVS sponsors are determined to build up a best practice organization from the upstart and seek IFCs assistance in this area. If TVS is successful with its strategy, this project will have a significant demonstration effect for the whole industry to follow and will allow IFC to expand its support to other major players in the industry.
The Project will be carried out as a part of a larger Vietnam Capital Markets Program. Consequently, the development impact is expected to be achieved at both industry and institutional levels.
